name: BluedotPointSDK
summary: The Bluedot Point SDK is powering the most innovative location-based apps for iOS and Android.
description:
Bluedot Innovation's cutting edge location services solution - the Bluedot Point SDK - is powering the most innovative location-based apps for iOS and Android.
  Deliver creative content and collect valuable analytics using Bluedot Innovation's powerful, precise and easy-to-use location services technology.
